DataElement.preferredName: Intervention or Procedure Not Performed Reason
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indication of the reason why an intervention or procedure was not performed.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Intervention or Procedure Not Performed Reason
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population. This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmental acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects._An indicator that specifies that an activity did not occur._An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A particular course of action intended to achieve a result.

Concepts.definition: An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population. This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmental acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects.

Property.preferredDefinition: An indicator that specifies that an activity did not occur.:An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

Concepts.definition: An indicator that specifies that an activity did not occur.
An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the management of a research protocol and its case report forms.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Physician; a licensed medical practitioner.: A position, opinion, or judgment reached on an issue under consideration.

Concepts.definition: A doctor; a person who has been educated, trained, and licensed to practice the art and science of medicine; a practitioner of medicine, as contrasted with a surgeon.
A position, opinion, or judgment reached on an issue under consideration.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.10.28 Added apostrophe in 'patient's' for ticket request CADSR0001637. ak

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.: An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.: A taxonomic category between Order and Genus. It consists of a group of organisms among which the differences are quite minor, e.g. Equiidae - horses and their relatives.: The act, fact, or principle of giving advantages to some particular person, object, or course of action over others; designated as more desirable.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
A taxonomic category between Order and Genus. It consists of a group of organisms among which the differences are quite minor, e.g. Equiidae - horses and their relatives.
The act, fact, or principle of giving advantages to some particular person, object, or course of action over others; designated as more desirable.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Any special symptom or circumstance that renders the use of a remedy or the carrying out of a procedure inadvisable, usually because of the risk.

Concepts.definition: A symptom or medical condition that makes a particular treatment or procedure inadvisable because a person is likely to have a bad reaction.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The disappearance of all signs of cancer in response to treatment.

Concepts.definition: The disappearance of all signs of cancer in response to treatment.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
